      • match_phrase_prefix

        public static String match_phrase_prefix(String key,
                                         Object value,
                                         int slop)
        短语前缀匹配查询.

        Returns documents that contain the words of a provided text, in the same order as provided. The last term of the provided text is treated as a prefix, matching any words that begin with that term.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        slop - slop(Optional, integer) Maximum number of positions allowed between matching tokens. Defaults to 0. Transposed terms have a slop of 2.
        返回:
        String script

      • match_phrase_prefix

        public static String match_phrase_prefix(String key,
                                         Object value,
                                         int max_expansions,
                                         int slop)
        短语前缀匹配查询.

        Returns documents that contain the words of a provided text, in the same order as provided. The last term of the provided text is treated as a prefix, matching any words that begin with that term.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        slop - slop(Optional, integer) Maximum number of positions allowed between matching tokens. Defaults to 0. Transposed terms have a slop of 2.
        max_expansions - Maximum number of terms to which the last provided term of the query value will expand.
        返回:
        String script

      • match_phrase

        public static String match_phrase(String key,
                                  Object value,
                                  int slop)
        短语匹配查询.

        The match_phrase query analyzes the text and creates a phrase query out of the analyzed text.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        slop - slop(Optional, integer) Maximum number of positions allowed between matching tokens. Defaults to 0. Transposed terms have a slop of 2.
        返回:
        String script

      • common

        public static String common(String key,
                            Object value,
                            double cutoff_frequency)
        排除高频率词查询查询.

        The common terms query is a modern alternative to stopwords which improves the precision and recall of search results (by taking stopwords into account), without sacrificing performance.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        cutoff_frequency - Terms are allocated to the high or low frequency groups based on the cutoff_frequency, which can be specified as an absolute frequency (>=1) or as a relative frequency (0.0 .. 1.0).
        返回:
        String script

      • fuzzy

        public static String fuzzy(String key,
                           Object value,
                           int fuzziness,
                           int prefix_length,
                           double boost)
        相似查询，可以允许错误 Allow bad queries.
        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        boost - boost Query ranking score
        prefix_length - Number of beginning characters left unchanged when creating expansions.
        fuzziness - Maximum edit distance allowed for matching. See Fuzziness for valid values and more information
        返回:
        String script

      • geo_shape

        public static String geo_shape(String type,
                               Object coordinates,
                               Object relation)
        地理位置查询.

        The geo_shape query uses the same grid square representation as the geo_shape mapping to find documents that have a shape that intersects with the query shape. It will also use the same Prefix Tree configuration as defined for the field mapping

        参数:
        type - field name
        coordinates - coordinate
        relation - Query mode
        返回:
        String script

      • ids

        public static String ids(Object... values)
        id查询.

        Returns documents based on their IDs. This query uses document IDs stored in the _id field.

        参数:
        values - ids valus
        返回:
        String script

      • multi_match

        public static String multi_match(Object value,
                                 String... keys)
        多字段分词查询.

        The multi_match query builds on the match query to allow multi-field queries

        参数:
        value - field value
        keys - field name
        返回:
        String script

      • more_like_this

        public static String more_like_this(int min_term_freq,
                                    int max_query_terms,
                                    Object value,
                                    String... keys)
        必须包含词查询，要求字段中必须包含某个词.

        The More Like This Query finds documents that are "like" a given set of documents. In order to do so, MLT selects a set of representative terms of these input documents, forms a query using these terms, executes the query and returns the results. The user controls the input documents, how the terms should be selected and how the query is formed.

        参数:
        min_term_freq - The minimum term frequency below which the terms will be ignored from the input document. Defaults to 2.
        max_query_terms - The maximum number of query terms that will be selected. Increasing this value gives greater accuracy at the expense of query execution speed. Defaults to 25
        value - field value
        keys - field name
        返回:
        String script

      • percolate

        public static String percolate(String key,
                               Object value,
                               String field)
        字段属性查询.

        The percolate query can be used to match queries stored in an index. The percolate query itself contains the document that will be used as query to match with the stored queries.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        field - The field of type percolator that holds the indexed queries. This is a required parameter.
        返回:
        String script

        public static String prefix(String key,
                            Object value,
                            double boost)
        左模糊查询.

        Returns documents that contain a specific prefix in a provided field.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        boost - boost Query ranking score

        String script

      • query_string

        public static String query_string(String default_field,
                                  Object query_)
        较为严格的字符串查询（可以进行和或非等操作，但如果查询中包含无效内容，则查询失败）.

        Returns documents based on a provided query string, using a parser with a strict syntax.

        This query uses a syntax to parse and split the provided query string based on operators, such as AND or NOT. The query then analyzes each split text independently before returning matching documents.

        参数:
        default_field - field name
        query_ - query script
        返回:
        String script

      • range

        public static String range(String key,
                           Object gte,
                           Object lte)
        范围查询 Returns documents that contain terms within a provided range.
        参数:
        key - field name
        gte - Greater than or equal to
        lte - Less than or equal to.
        返回:
        String script

        参数:

        gte - Greater than or equal to
        返回:
        String script

      • regexp

        public static String regexp(String key,
                            Object value,
                            int max_determinized_states)
        正则查询.

        Returns documents that contain terms matching a regular expression. A regular expression is a way to match patterns in data using placeholder characters, called operators. For a list of operators supported by the regexp query, see Regular expression syntax.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        max_determinized_states - Maximum number of automaton states required for the query. Default is 10000. Elasticsearch uses Apache Lucene internally to parse regular expressions. Lucene converts each regular expression to a finite automaton containing a number of determinized states. You can use this parameter to prevent that conversion from unintentionally consuming too many resources. You may need to increase this limit to run complex regular expressions.
        返回:
        String script

      • regexp

        public static String regexp(String key,
                            String value)
        正则查询.

        Returns documents that contain terms matching a regular expression. A regular expression is a way to match patterns in data using placeholder characters, called operators. For a list of operators supported by the regexp query, see Regular expression syntax.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        返回:
        String script

      • regexp

        public static String regexp(String key,
                            String value,
                            int max_determinized_states,
                            String flags)
        正则查询.

        Returns documents that contain terms matching a regular expression. A regular expression is a way to match patterns in data using placeholder characters, called operators. For a list of operators supported by the regexp query, see Regular expression syntax.

        参数:
        key - field name
        value - field value
        max_determinized_states - Maximum number of automaton states required for the query. Default is 10000. Elasticsearch uses Apache Lucene internally to parse regular expressions. Lucene converts each regular expression to a finite automaton containing a number of determinized states. You can use this parameter to prevent that conversion from unintentionally consuming too many resources. You may need to increase this limit to run complex regular expressions.
        flags - Enables optional operators for the regular expression. For valid values and more information, see Regular expression syntax
        返回:
        String script

      • script

        public static String script(String source)
        脚本查询 Filters documents based on a provided script. The script query is typically used in a filter context.
        参数:
        source - Contains a script to run as a query. This script must return a boolean value, true or false.
        返回:
        String script

      • script

        public static String script(String source,
                            String lang)
        脚本查询 Filters documents based on a provided script. The script query is typically used in a filter context.
        参数:
        source - Contains a script to run as a query. This script must return a boolean value, true or false.
        lang - scripting language
        返回:
        String script

      • script

        public static String script(String source,
                            String lang,
                            String params)
        脚本查询 Filters documents based on a provided script. The script query is typically used in a filter context.
        参数:
        source - Contains a script to run as a query. This script must return a boolean value, true or false.
        lang - scripting language
        params - variable
        返回:
        String script

      • simple_query_string

        public static String simple_query_string(String query,
                                         Object... filed)
        使用较为简单的符号操作进行查询（如+-|等），查询更为严格.

        Returns documents based on a provided query string, using a parser with a limited but fault-tolerant syntax.

        This query uses a simple syntax to parse and split the provided query string into terms based on special operators. The query then analyzes each term independently before returning matching documents.

        参数:
        query - query script
        filed - field name
        返回:
        String script

      • wripper

        public static String wripper(String query)
        A query that accepts any other query as base64 encoded string.
        参数:
        query - Base64 encoded string
        返回:
        String script
